Talk09:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Notice_01>How do you not know?!<sp:5:0:0> There's a rumor
that a legendary sword lies hidden
<clr:0000>somewhere in Hyrule<clr:ffff>!
Talk00:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>Huh. Maybe I'll try building a weapon like
yours for myself!
Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Ease_00>I'm gonna be honest with you. I'm not
great with this stuff, and that's kind of a
lot of pressure...<sp:5:0:0>but I sure will try!
Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Right? I figured it'd be.<sp:5:0:0> And I'd be really
annoyed if I broke something while trying
to remove it...
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>I was just kidding.<sp:5:1:0> Who knows if the
sword's even out there in the first place?
Talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:QuestionNormal_00>For real? That's surprising.<sp:5:0:0> I think it'd be
pretty tough for me...<sp:5:0:0>
Talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Notice_01>You don't know?<sp:5:0:0> There's a rumor that a
legendary sword lies hidden somewhere
in the <clr:0000>Lost Woods<clr:ffff>.
Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>Oh, but that's right!<sp:5:0:0>


There's a shop called <clr:0000>Break-a-Part<clr:ffff> in
Tarrey Town! That's just east of here.

They can apparently use their master
craftsmanship to detach anything from
anything! Like they were never attached!
Talk13:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Notice_00>If you want to talk, let's do it somewhere
out of the rain!
Talk14:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh, you're the traveler who destroyed
that ore deposit!<sp:5:0:0>

Hee-hee, of course I remember you. Who
could forget a strike THAT impressive?
Talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>Maybe I should try making a weapon like
the one you used to have...
Talk05:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_00>Ah, sorry.<sp:5:0:0> Just sort of dozed off there.


<sp:3:0:2:0c01>You always have weapons that I've never
seen before.<sp:5:0:0> Like that one there! Did you
make it yourself?
Talk06:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>Wow. You're good at making things!<sp:5:0:0>
Maybe I'll try to make something too.

<sp:3:0:2:0201>Yeah! I'll work hard and make a weapon to
rival the <clr:0000>legendary sword<clr:ffff>! You'll see!
Talk07:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>But I'm kinda...<sp:5:0:0>bad at that crafty stuff.<sp:5:1:0>
Plus, isn't it <clr:0000>hard to remove something<clr:ffff>
once you've attached it?
Talk08:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Hmm.<sp:5:0:0> Maybe I'll do some searching too.<sp:5:0:0>
Like, maybe somebody just left the
<clr:0000>legendary sword <clr:ffff>lying around somewhere!
